inclusion.criterion: Severe carotid artery stenosis (unilateral stenosis > 70%) diagnosed according to angiography
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Provision of informed consent regarding trial procedure
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Severe cardiovascular, hepatic, renal, or blood system diseases
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Hemorrhagic disease or unable to receive anticoagulation or antiplatelet aggregation
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Unable to or declined to cooperate with follow-up examination
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Unable to provide informed consent because of intellectual disability or language disorder
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has carotid bruits and significant bilateral carotid stenosis. He reports occasional dizziness but no prior syncope or residual deficits from a possible stroke 10-15 years ago.
